sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'
import { Container, Grid, Button, Form, Select } from 'semantic-ui-react'

class CreateUser extends React.Component {
  state = {
    email: '',
    password: '',
    type: {},
    firstName: '',
    lastName: '',
    avatar: '',
    verifyPassword: '',
    modalOpen: false
  }

  handleOpen = () => this.setState({ modalOpen: true })

  handleClose = () => this.setState({ modalOpen: false })

  handleChange = (e) => {
    const update = {}
    update[e.target.name] = e.target.value
    this.setState(update)
  }

  submit = async (e) => {
    const values = this.state
    this.props.signup(values)
  }

  userOptions = [
    { key: 'a', text: 'Admin', value: 'admin' },
    { key: 'e', text: 'Employee', value: 'employee' }
  ]

  render() {
    return (
      <Container style={{ marginTop: '100px' }}>
        <Grid>
          <Grid.Row columns={1} centered>
            <Grid.Column width={6}>
              <Form>
                <Form.Field>
                  <label>First Name</label>
                  <input required name='firstName' type='text' placeholder='First Name' />
                </Form.Field>
                <Form.Field>
                  <label>Last Name</label>
                  <input required name='lastName' type='text' placeholder='Last Name' />
                </Form.Field>
                <Form.Field>
                  <label>Email Address</label>
                  <input required name='email' type='text' placeholder='Email Address' />
                </Form.Field>
                <Form.Field
                  required
                  name='type'
                  control={Select}
                  options={this.userOptions}
                  label={{ children: 'User Type', htmlFor: 'form-select-control-user' }}
                  placeholder='User Type'
                  search
                  searchInput={{ id: 'form-select-control-user' }}
                />
                <Form.Field>
                  <label>Avatar</label>
                  <input required name='avatar' type='file' name='profileImage' />
                </Form.Field>

                <Button type='submit'>Submit</Button>
              </Form>
            </Grid.Column>
          </Grid.Row>
        </Grid>
      </Container>
    )
  }
}

export default CreateUser
